short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the trending searches suggestions on the search box on google.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes the "Trending searches" suggestions on Google Search are not necessarily school-appropriate. Google admins don't have the capability to disable those from being displayed. This extension will hide those Google Search suggestions that are shown under "Trending searches" without hiding the other search suggestion subtypes. Google admins wanting to use this in their domains should force install this extension on student Google accounts with Developer Tools disabled otherwise they could use the Inspect Tool.
